text: Elizabeth Johnston Patterson (November 18, 1939 â€“ November 10, 2018) was an American politician. She was born in Columbia, South Carolina. She was a member of the Democratic Party. Patterson was a member of the United States House of Representatives from South Carolina's 4th congressional district. Patterson died from a long-illness on November 10, 2018 in Greenville, South Carolina at the age of 78.Former SC Rep.
